thread.title: Great hotel, well looked after
thread.title_full: Great hotel, well looked after - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: traveller2017europe
title: Great hotel, well looked after
text: Great hotel and management really aim to please, nothing is too much trouble. Breakfast is a real highlight, great spread and there are snacks and tea available all the time. Good quality rooms and nice modern clean feel. I visited with my mother planning on a 1 night stay, got upgraded to a beautiful suite. They survey you before for anything you might need so we were given adaptors when we arrived and a great restaurant list in advance. at least 2 really great restaurants nearby. Our Eurostar home was cancelled and the hotel kindly helped out, gave us a lovely room for the second night at a decent price and breakfast. Really appreciated the kindness in our hour of need. 2 mins walk from the metro station, so perfect for getting around and only 25 mins from gare du nord.
